title: AG60166: Off-Road Vehicle Engineering - Quick Facts
text:
AG60166
Course name | Off-Road Vehicle Engineering
Offered by | Agricultural & Food Engineering
Credits | 4
L-T-P | 3-1-0
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | Spring

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Engine components and basic engine nomenclature, IC engine classification, Air standard cycle and fuel cycle analysis for diesel and dual combustion or limited pressure cycle, Difference between actual and fuel air cycles in diesel engines, Combustion in CI engines, Alternate fuels for CI engines, Engine friction and lubrication, Engine cooling, Supercharging, Dual fuel and multifuel engines, Exhaust emissions and its measurement, Testing of farm engines, Performance parameter and characteristics.
